ingredients: 21 grams (3 tablespoons, from about 2 stalks) bruised and minced lemongrass¹
113 grams (4 ounces or 1 cup, packed) whole Napa cabbage ceaves (do not remove white rib), very finely chopped
1/4 cup (from about 2 -3) quartered and thinly sliced scallions (light, medium and dark green parts)
1/2 pound (227 grams or 8 ounces) ground chicken thighs
120 grams (1 cup) millet flour, plus more for rolling
312 grams (11 ounces or 1 1/4 cups plus 2 tablespoons) Boiling Water
1 quartered and thinly (about 1 tablespoon) sliced scallion (light, medium and dark green parts)
